#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int sq(int n){return n*n;}

int gt_max(int &a, int &b, int &c){
    int sd=0;
    if(a>b&&a>c){}
    else{
        if(b>c){
           sd=b;
           b=a;
           a=sd;
        }else{
            sd=c;
            c=a;
            a=sd;
        }
    }
}

int main(){
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    while(t--){
        int x1,y1,x2,y2,x3,y3;
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> x3 >> y3;
        int a = sq(x1-x2)+sq(y2-y1);
        int b = sq(x2-x3)+sq(y2-y3);
        int c = sq(x1-x3)+sq(y1-y3);
        if(a==b || a==c || b==c){
            if(n==1) cout << "Isosceles triangle" << endl;
            else{
                gt_max(a,b,c);
                if(a>b+c) cout << "Isosceles obtuse triangle" << endl;
                else if(a<b+c) cout << "Isosceles acute triangle" << endl;
                else{
                    cout << "Isosceles right triangle" << endl;
                }
            }
        }else{
            if(n==1) cout << "Scalene triangle" << endl;
            else{
                gt_max(a,b,c);
                if(a>b+c) cout << "Scalene obtuse triangle" << endl;
                else if(a<b+c) cout << "Scalene acute triangle" << endl;
                else{
                    cout << "Scalene right triangle" << endl;
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
